Html: Any interest in providing health checks to monitor Azure - there seems to be a pretty rich data set available from the Azure diagnostics....ideas on what to monitor would be welcome...!

Some role information perhaps, i think this would be what your looking for http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windowsazure/microsoft.windowsazure.serviceruntime.roleenvironment.aspx

And status check http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windowsazure/microsoft.windowsazure.serviceruntime.roleenvironment.statuscheck.aspx

If I deploy wolfpack in a server/agent config it will actually run on a azure vm so this would be interesting.
